Posts.EditableText:
I've tried it on Firefox and Chrome, no sound, not even the little speaker on my tab that says hey a sound is playing.

I do definitely have sound throughout the game... tried switching the sounds to something else too and it's still silent. Even uploading new sounds won't play them.

I have .mp3 AND .wav files and they both don't work. This has not been a problem up until this last week (when the project is due, lol)

I first noticed the error when I tried to view the story on my phone to show someone else.

Please help? 

[EDIT] Heyyy....wouldn't you know it, I just needed to close the browsers and restart everything. Problem solved!

Posts.EditableText: To be clear, there is sound ASSIGNED. It didn't get deleted, but it does not play! D: so frustrating!
